words.translation: Asked|a questioner|for a punishment|bound to happen

translations.15: A challenger has demanded a punishment bound to come

words.translation: To the disbelievers|not|of it|any preventer

translations.15: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—

words.translation: From|Allah|Owner|(of) the ways of ascent

translations.15: from Allah, Lord of pathways of ˹heavenly˺ ascent

words.translation: Ascend|the Angels|and the Spirit|to Him|in|a Day|[is]|its measure|(is) fifty|thousand|year(s)

translations.1: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war-Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah
translations.15: ˹through which˺ the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length

words.translation: So be patient|a patience|good

translations.15: So endure ˹this denial, O Prophet,˺ with beautiful patience

words.translation: Indeed they|see it|(as) far off

translations.15: They truly see this ˹Day˺ as impossible

words.translation: But We see it|near

translations.15: but We see it as inevitable

words.translation: (The) Day|will be|the sky|like molten copper

translations.15: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass

words.translation: And will be|the mountains|like wool

translations.15: and the mountains like ˹tufts of˺ wool

words.translation: And not|will ask|a friend|(of) a friend

translations.15: And no close friend will ask ˹about˺ their friends

words.translation: They will be made to see each other|Would wish|the criminal|if|he (could be) ransomed|from|(the) punishment|(of) that Day|by his children

translations.1: Yubassaroonahum; ya-waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaneeh
translations.15: ˹although˺ they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children

words.translation: And his spouse|and his brother

translations.15: their spouses, their siblings

words.translation: And his nearest kindred|who|sheltered him

translations.15: their clan that sheltered them

words.translation: And whoever|(is) on|the earth|all|then|it (could) save him

translations.1: Wa-man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh
translations.15: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves

words.translation: By no means!|Indeed it (is)|surely a Flame of Hell

translations.15: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame

words.translation: A remover|of the skin of the head

translations.15: ripping off scalps

words.translation: Inviting|(him) who|turned his back|and went away

translations.15: It will summon whoever turned their backs ˹on Allah˺ and turned away ˹from the truth˺

words.translation: And collected|and hoarded

translations.15: and gathered and hoarded ˹wealth˺

words.translation: Indeed|the man|was created|anxious

translations.15: Indeed, humankind was created impatient

words.translation: When|touches him|the evil|distressed

translations.15: distressed when touched with evil

words.translation: And when|touches him|the good|withholding

translations.15: and withholding when touched with good—

words.translation: Except|those who pray

translations.15: except those who pray

words.translation: Those who|[they]|at|their prayer|(are) constant

translations.15: consistently performing their prayers

words.translation: And those who|in|their wealth|(is) a right|known

translations.15: and who give the rightful share of their wealth

words.translation: For the one who asks|and the deprived

translations.15: to the beggar and the poor

words.translation: And those who|accept (the) truth|(of the) Day|(of) the Judgment

translations.15: and who ˹firmly˺ believe in the Day of Judgment

words.translation: And those who|[they]|of|(the) punishment|(of) their Lord|(are) fearful

translations.15: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—

words.translation: Indeed|(the) punishment|(of) your Lord|(is) not|to be felt secure (of)

translations.15: ˹knowing that˺ none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—

words.translation: And those who|[they]|their modesty|(are) guardians

translations.15: and those who guard their chastity

words.translation: Except|from|their spouses|or|what|they possess|rightfully|then indeed, they|(are) not|blameworthy

translations.1: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fa-innahum ghairu maloomeen
translations.15: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, for then they are free from blame

words.translation: But whoever|seeks|beyond|that|then those|[they]|(are) the transgressors

translations.1: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
translations.15: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors

words.translation: And those who|[they]|of their trusts|and their promise|(are) observers

translations.15: ˹The faithful are˺ also those who are true to their trusts and covenants

words.translation: And those who|[they]|in their testimonies|stand firm

translations.15: and who are honest in their testimony

words.translation: And those who|[they]|on|their prayer|keep a guard

translations.15: and who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers

words.translation: Those|(will be) in|Gardens|honored

translations.15: These will be in Gardens, held in honour

words.translation: So what is with|those who|disbelieve|before you|(they) hasten

translations.15: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush ˹head-long˺ towards you ˹O Prophet˺

words.translation: On|the right|and on|the left|(in) separate groups

translations.15: from the right and the left, in groups ˹to mock you˺

words.translation: Does long|every|person|among them|that|he enters|a Garden|(of) Delight

translations.1: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum any yudkhala jannata Na'eem
translations.15: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss

words.translation: By no means!|Indeed We|[We] have created them|from what|they know

translations.15: But no! Indeed, they ˹already˺ know what We created them from

words.translation: But nay!|I swear|by (the) Lord|(of) the rising|and the settings|that We|(are) surely Able

translations.1: Falaaa uqsimu bi-Rabbil mashaariqi wal-maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon
translations.15: So, I do swear by the Lord of ˹all˺ the points of sunrise and sunset that We are truly capable

words.translation: To|that|We replace|(with) better|than them;|and not|We|(are) to be outrun

translations.1: Alaaa an nubaddila khairan minhum Wa-maa nahnu bi-masbooqeen
translations.15: of replacing them with ˹others˺ better than them, and We cannot be prevented ˹from doing so˺

words.translation: So leave them|(to) converse vainly|and amuse themselves|until|they meet|their Day|which|they are promised

translations.1: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yawma-humul lazee yoo'adoon
translations.15: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—

words.translation: (The) Day|they will come out|from|the graves|rapidly|as if they (were)|to|a goal|hastening

translations.1: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka-anna-hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon
translations.15: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol ˹for a blessing˺

words.translation: Humbled|their eyes|will cover them|humiliation|That|(is) the Day|which|they were|promised

translations.1: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazee kaanoo yoo'adoon
translations.15: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have ˹always˺ been warned of
